text: Faranah is a region in east-central Guinea. It is bordered by the countries of Sierra Leone and Mali and the Guinean regions of Kankan, Mamou, Nzérékoré, and Labé. The regional capital is the town of Faranah. As of the 2014 census, 942,733 people lived there. It has an area of . == Prefectures == * Dabola Prefecture * Dinguiraye Prefecture * Faranah Prefecture * Kissidougou Prefecture Category:Regions of Guinea
title: Faranah Region
